steps.conclusion: None. The output follows the special rule for language exams: exactly one suggestion, title equals the exam name, is_language_course=true. Title length, formatting, language, and icon prefix all comply.

Very minor: The description mentions immigration, which is not a typical primary use case for TOEFL compared to academic admissions; however, description content is de-emphasized per expectations and it's still plausible in some contexts.

Optionally specify “TOEFL iBT” as the title for precision, keeping all other constraints intact. Consider aligning the description more strictly with academic admissions and score goals rather than immigration.
